description:
WHAT IS IT?


MCoBeauty's Hair & Brow Magic Wand is a 2-in-1 clear hair and brow gel works overtime to instantly tame flyaways, baby hairs and refine eyebrows. The firm micro-brush and clear formula ensures hair looks smooth and sleek, but never feels oily, hard or dirty.


 

WHAT IT DOES:?


  • Tames flyaways & baby hairs and grooms eyebrows??
  • Instantly create slick ponytails and buns?
  • ?Micro-brush evenly distributes product
  • Long-wear formula lasts all day



    • WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT:??


      • Universal clear shade suits all hair colours?
      • Suitable for all hair types and textures
      • Perfect for touch-ups on-the-go
name: Mcobeauty Hair & Brow Magic Wand 10ml
